verses.verse: O come <WH3212> <WH8798>, let us sing <WH7442> <WH8762> unto the YY <WH3068>: let us make a joyful noise <WH7321> <WH8686> to the rock <WH6697> of our salvation <WH3468>.
Let us come <WH6923> <WH8762> before his presence <WH6440> with thanksgiving <WH8426>, and make a joyful noise <WH7321> <WH8686> unto him with psalms <WH2158>.
For the YY <WH3068> is a great <WH1419> 'Elohim <WH410>, and a great <WH1419> King <WH4428> above all 'elohim <WH430>.
In his hand <WH3027> are the deep places <WH4278> of the earth <WH776>: the strength <WH8443> of the hills <WH2022> is his also.
The sea <WH3220> is his, and he made <WH6213> <WH8804> it: and his hands <WH3027> formed <WH3335> <WH8804> the dry <WH3006> land.
O come <WH935> <WH8798>, let us worship <WH7812> <WH8691> and bow down <WH3766> <WH8799>: let us kneel <WH1288> <WH8799> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> our maker <WH6213> <WH8802>.

For he is our 'Elohim <WH430>; and we are the people <WH5971> of his pasture <WH4830>, and the sheep <WH6629> of his hand <WH3027>. To day <WH3117> if ye will hear <WH8085> <WH8799> his voice <WH6963>,
Harden <WH7185> <WH8686> not your heart <WH3824>, as in the provocation <WH4808>, and as in the day <WH3117> of temptation <WH4531> in the wilderness <WH4057>:
When your fathers <WH1> tempted <WH5254> <WH8765> me, proved <WH974> <WH8804> me, and saw <WH7200> <WH8804> my work <WH6467>.

Forty <WH705> years <WH8141> long was I grieved <WH6962> <WH8799> with this generation <WH1755>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, It is a people <WH5971> that do err <WH8582> <WH8802> in their heart <WH3824>, and they have not known <WH3045> <WH8804> my ways <WH1870>:
Unto whom I sware <WH7650> <WH8738> in my wrath <WH639> that they should not enter <WH935> <WH8799> into my rest <WH4496>.
